com.dropoutdesign.ddf.module
Class Module

java.lang.Object
  com.dropoutdesign.ddf.module.Module
Direct Known Subclasses:
ReliableModule
public class Module
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a DDF module, attached to this computer.

connect

public void connect()
             throws ModuleIOException
Connect to this module.

Throws:
UnkownConnectionTypeException - the address of the module (specified in the ModuleConfig) specifies an unkown protocol.
ModuleIOException - the connection could not be established.

connect

public void connect(long timeout)
             throws ModuleIOException
Throws:
ModuleIOException

disconnect

public void disconnect()
Disconnect from this module.

writeFrame

public void writeFrame(byte[] frame)
                throws ModuleIOException
Write a frame to this module. This method takes a full DanceFloor frame as input, and uses this module's bounds field to determine what pixels to send across.

Parameters:
frame - a full DanceFloor frame.
Throws:
ModuleIOException - the frame could not be sent.
See Also:
DanceFloor.drawFrame(byte[])
